title: AI for Materials Design
description: We develop and apply artificial intelligence technologies to accelerate materials design and discovery.
details: Generative models for novel material design
Optimization of material structures using AI-driven simulations

title: AI-Based Materials Analysis and Evaluation
description: We utilize artificial intelligence to analyze, evaluate, and predict the properties and performance of various materials.
details: Automated analysis of experimental and simulation data
Performance prediction and reliability assessment using machine learning models

title: Physics-Informed AI for Materials Process Prediction
description: We apply physics-informed artificial intelligence models to predict, simulate, and optimize materials processing behaviors with high accuracy and reliability.
details: Development of physics-informed machine learning models for process prediction
Hybrid AI–simulation frameworks for modeling complex processing phenomena
Improvement of process accuracy through integration of physical constraints and real data

title: Materials-Specialized VLMs and AI Agents
description: We develop vision-language models and AI agents tailored for materials science to enhance analysis, automation, and decision-making in research workflows.
details: Development of materials-focused vision-language models for image and text understanding
AI agents for automating experimental planning and research workflows
Integration of multimodal AI systems for advanced materials analysis and discovery

title: Autonomous Laboratory for Metallic Materials
description: We build autonomous experimental platforms for metallic materials, integrating robotics and AI to accelerate materials discovery and optimization.
details: Robotics-assisted synthesis and processing of metallic materials
Automated characterization and data-driven feedback loops
